creator: sbailliez@apache.org
text:
There is a minor race condition on the application deployment (deploy command) 
in the HtmlManagerServlet (and not in managerservlet for now because of bug 
28830).

if liveDeploy is true, the thread could basically start deploying the war just 
written into appBase directory. The servlet would then fail when calling the 
install command as the HostConfig thread already did it.

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
This has been fixed in SVN and will be included in 4.1.32 onwards.

As yet, no release plans have been announced for 4.1.32
